languages.text: "...однако, источник этих благодеяний пересох, стоило ему прознать о нашей с вами связи, шерин. Я сочла, что есть что-то глубоко неправильное в том, что наша с вами страсть печальным образом отражается на моем процветании. А посему позволила себе напомнить Высокому фактотуму о его прежней щедрости".

"...however, the source of these blessings dried up as soon as he learned of our connection, shereen. I considered it profoundly wrong that our affection should have had such an unhappy effect on my material well-being. Therefore, I took it upon myself to remind the High Factotum of his previous largesse."
languages.original_text: "...однако, источник этих благодеяний пересох, стоило ему прознать о нашей с вами связи, шерин. Я сочла, что есть что-то глубоко неправильное в том, что наша с вами страсть печальным образом отражается на моем процветании. А посему позволила себе напомнить Высокому фактотуму о его прежней щедрости".

traits.locale_text: "...however, the source of these blessings dried up as soon as he learned of our connection, shereen. I considered it profoundly wrong that our affection should have had such an unhappy effect on my material well-being. Therefore, I took it upon myself to remind the High Factotum of his previous largesse."
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

traits.locale_text: "...however, the source of these blessings dried up as soon as he learned of our connection, shereen. I considered it profoundly wrong that our affection should have had such an unhappy effect on my material well-being. Therefore, I took it upon myself to remind the High Factotum of his previous largesse."

I considered it profoundly wrong that our affection should have had such an unhappy effect on my material well-being. Therefore, I took it upon myself to remind the High Factotum of his previous largesse."
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

traits.locale_text: "...however, the source of these blessings dried up as soon as he learned of our connection, shereen. I considered it profoundly wrong that our affection should have had such an unhappy effect on my material well-being. Therefore, I took it upon myself to remind the High Factotum of his previous largesse."
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: “……然而，自从他得知我们的关系之后，那些美妙的礼物就消失了，亲爱的。我们之间的感情，竟然对我的物质生活造成了如此不愉快的影响，这实在是太不应该了。鉴于此，我便自作主张地提醒了高阶顾问，希望他继续履行之前的慷慨。”
languages.original_text: "...however, the source of these blessings dried up as soon as he learned of our connection, shereen. I considered it profoundly wrong that our affection should have had such an unhappy effect on my material well-being. Therefore, I took it upon myself to remind the High Factotum of his previous largesse."

traits.locale_text: “……然而，自从他得知我们的关系之后，那些美妙的礼物就消失了，亲爱的。我们之间的感情，竟然对我的物质生活造成了如此不愉快的影响，这实在是太不应该了。鉴于此，我便自作主张地提醒了高阶顾问，希望他继续履行之前的慷慨。”
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: 「…でも、彼はあたしたちの関係を知るやいなや、その祝福の源は途絶えてしまったの、シャリーン。あたしは、あたしたちの愛情が物質的な幸福にこんな不幸な影響を及ぼすのは、すごく間違ってるって思ったんだ。だから、あたしはハイ・ファクトタムに受けた、かつての寛大さを忘れないようにしたんだ」
languages.original_text: "...however, the source of these blessings dried up as soon as he learned of our connection, shereen. I considered it profoundly wrong that our affection should have had such an unhappy effect on my material well-being. Therefore, I took it upon myself to remind the High Factotum of his previous largesse."

traits.locale_text: 「…でも、彼はあたしたちの関係を知るやいなや、その祝福の源は途絶えてしまったの、シャリーン。あたしは、あたしたちの愛情が物質的な幸福にこんな不幸な影響を及ぼすのは、すごく間違ってるって思ったんだ。だから、あたしはハイ・ファクトタムに受けた、かつての寛大さを忘れないようにしたんだ」
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: «... Sin embargo, el origen de estas bendiciones se secó en cuanto descubrió nuestra relación, shereen. Consideraba una injusticia profunda que nuestro afecto tuviera un efecto tan negativo sobre mi bienestar material y por lo tanto me encargué de recordar al Sumo Factótum su anterior generosidad».
languages.original_text: "...however, the source of these blessings dried up as soon as he learned of our connection, shereen. I considered it profoundly wrong that our affection should have had such an unhappy effect on my material well-being. Therefore, I took it upon myself to remind the High Factotum of his previous largesse."

traits.locale_text: «... Sin embargo, el origen de estas bendiciones se secó en cuanto descubrió nuestra relación, shereen. Consideraba una injusticia profunda que nuestro afecto tuviera un efecto tan negativo sobre mi bienestar material y por lo tanto me encargué de recordar al Sumo Factótum su anterior generosidad».
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: « Cependant, la source de ces dons s'est asséchée à l'instant même où il a découvert le lien qui existait entre nous, shereen. J'ai trouvé profondément injuste que notre affection ait un effet aussi néfaste sur mon bien-être matériel, c'est pourquoi j'ai pris l'initiative de rappeler au haut factotum sa générosité passée. »
languages.original_text: "...however, the source of these blessings dried up as soon as he learned of our connection, shereen. I considered it profoundly wrong that our affection should have had such an unhappy effect on my material well-being. Therefore, I took it upon myself to remind the High Factotum of his previous largesse."

traits.locale_text: « Cependant, la source de ces dons s'est asséchée à l'instant même où il a découvert le lien qui existait entre nous, shereen. J'ai trouvé profondément injuste que notre affection ait un effet aussi néfaste sur mon bien-être matériel, c'est pourquoi j'ai pris l'initiative de rappeler au haut factotum sa générosité passée. »
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: "... aber die Quelle seiner Segen versiegte, als er von unserer Verbindung erfuhr, Shereen. Ich empfand es als völlig ungerecht, dass sich unsere Zuneigung so unglücklich auf mein materielles Wohlergehen ausgewirkt hätte. Das ist der Grund, warum ich das Hoch-Faktotum an seine frühere Freigiebigkeit erinnert habe."
languages.original_text: "...however, the source of these blessings dried up as soon as he learned of our connection, shereen. I considered it profoundly wrong that our affection should have had such an unhappy effect on my material well-being. Therefore, I took it upon myself to remind the High Factotum of his previous largesse."

traits.locale_text: "... aber die Quelle seiner Segen versiegte, als er von unserer Verbindung erfuhr, Shereen. Ich empfand es als völlig ungerecht, dass sich unsere Zuneigung so unglücklich auf mein materielles Wohlergehen ausgewirkt hätte. Das ist der Grund, warum ich das Hoch-Faktotum an seine frühere Freigiebigkeit erinnert habe."
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: "Ancak bu lütufların kaynağı, kendisi bizim aramızdaki bağlantıyı öğrenir öğrenmez kuruyuverdi şirinim. İlişkimizin maddi esenliğime nahoş bir etkide bulunuyor olmasının yanlış olduğunu düşünüyorum. Dolayısıyla Arşıkâhya'ya, önceki eli açıklığını hatırlatma sorumluluğum olduğu kanısına vardım."
languages.original_text: "...however, the source of these blessings dried up as soon as he learned of our connection, shereen. I considered it profoundly wrong that our affection should have had such an unhappy effect on my material well-being. Therefore, I took it upon myself to remind the High Factotum of his previous largesse."

traits.locale_text: "Ancak bu lütufların kaynağı, kendisi bizim aramızdaki bağlantıyı öğrenir öğrenmez kuruyuverdi şirinim. İlişkimizin, maddi esenliğime nahoş bir etkide bulunuyor olmasının, içtenlikle yanlış olduğunu düşünüyorum. Dolayısıyla Arşıkâhya'ya, önceki eli açıklığını hatırlatma sorumluluğum olduğu kanısına vardım."
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion
